The event "The Holy Flame's Gift" has kicked off at 6:00 PM on November 29 PST!
This event consists of <color=#95C7FF>Present Leveling Battles</color> and <color=#95C7FF>Score Battles</color>.
By clearing <color=#95C7FF>Present Leveling Battles</color>, you can raise your Present Level, which increases the number of items that you can obtain to attempt Score Battles.
Through <color=#95C7FF>Score Battles</color>, you can obtain materials based on your damage score that can be traded for valuable rewards such as exclusive weapons.
Exclusive weapons can also be obtained from present rewards and mission rewards.
*Exchange period is until Dec. 27 5:59 PM PST.

"Valentine's Event: The Secret Sweetheart" has kicked off on Jan. 30 6:00 PM PST! The event consists of <color=#95C7FF>gathering leveling battles</color> and <color=#95C7FF>score battles</color>.

By clearing <color=#95C7FF>gathering leveling battles</color>, you can raise your item gathering level, which increases the number of items that you can obtain to attempt score battles.

Through <color=#95C7FF>score battles</color>, you can obtain materials based on your damage score that can be traded for valuable rewards such as exclusive weapons.

Exclusive weapons can also be obtained as item gathering rewards.
*Exchange period is until Feb. 20 5:59 PM PST.

As of Mar. 6 6:00 PM PST, the event "Escalation Challenge: Odin" is on now.
Escalation Challenges are high-difficulty content that challenge the player to see how high a level you can clear while the Escalation Level increases with each boss that is defeated.
In battles where the Escalation Level is 20 or lower, you can obtain items such as Escalation Medals as First Clear Rewards.
In addition, by clearing battles with an Escalation Level of 21 or higher, you can earn a title for each level.
*From level 21 onwards, titles can be earned as rewards for the General Mission, and missions can also be completed by completing another upcoming Escalation Challenge.

Escalation Medal is obtainable as a First Clear Reward in the Escalation Challenge.
Escalation Medals can be exchanged for a Premium Draw Ticket, a Greater Power Branding Stone, and more.
*Escalation Medals have no expiration date.
*The Escalation Medal Exchange will periodically reset the number of available exchanges and update its lineup.
*The next update of the exchange is scheduled for May 28 7:00 PM PDT.
